name: Society for Social Regeneration and Equity

address: Rajeev Nagar, Kanchan Bihari Marg, Kalyanpur

briefDescription: SSRE works for human rights, with particular focus on women & child, minorities and the marginalized, excluded and underprivileged sections of society, and for the promotion of interfaith amity & cross-cultural understanding. Other objectives of the organization are, promoting art and culture, protecting the environment and providing training for self-employment (entrepreneurship) and rural development. In its past 4 years of operation the organization served around 3000 individuals in various aspects of life.
